## TileDataAccessorOptions interface

An interface that provides options for \[\[TileDataAccessor\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TileDataAccessorOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [onlyWithFeatureIds](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessoroptions.onlywithfeatureids.md) | boolean | Limit to objects that have <code>featureID</code>s. |
|  [wantsAll](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessoroptions.wantsall.md) | boolean | Sets and overrides <code>wantPoints</code>, <code>wantLines</code>, <code>wantAreas</code>, <code>wantObject3D</code>. |
|  [wantsAreas](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessoroptions.wantsareas.md) | boolean | <code>true</code> to visit area objects. |
|  [wantsLines](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessoroptions.wantslines.md) | boolean | <code>true</code> to visit lines. |
|  [wantsObject3D](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessoroptions.wantsobject3d.md) | boolean | <code>true</code> to visit general 3D objects. |
|  [wantsPoints](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessoroptions.wantspoints.md) | boolean | <code>true</code> to visit points. |
